sentences.en: ... the unit headed by Sergeant Bell.
sentences.cn: 由贝尔巡佐带领的分队。

sentences.en: a Russian army unit
sentences.cn: 俄罗斯陆军分队

sentences.en: A Serb army unit took the town.
sentences.cn: 一支塞尔维亚部队攻占了那个镇。

sentences.en: a unit for rehabilitating drug addicts
sentences.cn: 帮助吸毒者恢复正常生活的机构

sentences.en: Agriculture was based in the past on the family as a unit.
sentences.cn: 过去的农业是以家庭为单位的。

sentences.en: control/display/filter etc unit
sentences.cn: 控制/显示/过滤等装置

sentences.en: Each unit including the parent company has its own, local management.
sentences.cn: 包括母公司在内，每个单位都有自己的地方管理层。

sentences.en: Logistically it is very difficult to value unit-linked policies.
sentences.cn: 为投连险保单定价操作起来非常困难。

sentences.en: The cell is the unit of which all living organisms are composed.
sentences.cn: 细胞是构成一切生物的单位。

sentences.en: The electronic and printing unit has annual sales of about $80 million.
sentences.cn: 电子印刷部门每年销售额约为8,000万美元。

sentences.en: The family is the basic social unit of modern society.
sentences.cn: 家庭是现代社会的基本单位。

sentences.en: the hospital's neonatal unit
sentences.cn: 医院的新生儿科

sentences.en: The man is in the hospital’s intensive care unit.
sentences.cn: 那名男子在医院的重症监护室。

sentences.en: The results from this unit are staggering.
sentences.cn: 这个团队得出的结果令人吃惊。

sentences.en: The unit includes built-in digital effects like reverb.
sentences.cn: 这个设备具有诸如混响之类的内置数码音效。

sentences.en: The unit is comparatively easy to install and cheap to operate.
sentences.cn: 这种设备比较容易安装而且用起来便宜。

sentences.en: The unit's exports will total $85 million this year.
sentences.cn: 该部门今年的出口总额将达8,500万美元。

sentences.en: The watt is a unit of electrical power.
sentences.cn: 农业过去以一个家庭单元为基础。

sentences.en: The watt is a unit of electrical power.
sentences.cn: 瓦是电功率单位。

sentences.en: Their unit was shelling the German lines only seven miles away.
sentences.cn: 他们的部队在炮轰仅有7英里之遥的德军防线。

sentences.en: Unit sales of T-shirts increased 6%.
sentences.cn: T恤的单位产品销售量增加了6%。

words.tran_cn: 单元化；联合经营；统一化
使成为一单位；使成一整体；单元化

trans.tran_cn: 单位，单元，班组，小队，病区，设备，部件
trans.tran_en: an amount of something used as a standard of measurement
